snippet: Claudia Paz y Paz, who has taken on a former dictator and top drug traffickers, was left off of a shortlist of candidates to be considered for re-election.
abstract: Guatemala’s attorney general, Claudia Paz y Paz, whose prosecution of a former dictator for genocide earned her the enmity of powerful members of the country’s political and business elite, loses her bid for a second term.
lead_paragraph: Claudia Paz y Paz, who has taken on a former dictator and top drug traffickers, was left off of a shortlist of candidates to be considered for re-election.

headline.main: Attorney General in Guatemala Excluded From Re-election Bid
headline.print_headline: Guatemala: Attorney General Spurned in Bid to Keep Office for a Second Term

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
